attributes.action: Financially help all Self Employed who haven't had any help from SEISS.
attributes.additional_details:
After being employed for 33 years I became self employed on the 14th January 2019.
HMRC could see i had continous employment.
These factors should be taken into consideration .
Not everyone will recover and  pay back a loan. 
Not everyone is entitled to one.
I work In a Hotel, where there isn't any passing trade.
Weddings have been cancelled this effects us all .
Ppe costs
Ppe,cleaning products and disposables to be Vat 0%
attributes.background:
Re assess the criteria for the self employed to include Tax year 2019/20 for the newly self employed of that year .
Assess new businesses that started this year to include a reduction in taxes  or none to to be paid if the business has had a reduction or no Sales since March due to Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend income replacement schemes to those who don't currently qualify: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560845

Change the criteria for SEISS grants for 2019-2020 tax year traders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333321

One-off Grant To Be Paid To Anyone Who Has Not Benefited From A Covid-19 Scheme: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319899
